casebody.data:
David DUBINSKY
v.
Veronica REICH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 10, 2019

Kenneth A. Votre, New Haven, in support of the petition.

Michael R. Keller, Bridgeport, James L. Brawley, Hartford and Eva M. Kolstad, Bridgeport, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 255, 201 A.3d 1153 (2019), is denied.

McDONALD, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
